title: “Beautiful Nonsense” - Paradox Perfect with Brennan Lee Mulligan & Drakoniques
itunes:title: “Beautiful Nonsense” - Paradox Perfect with Brennan Lee Mulligan & Drakoniques
description:
What do time travel, angels, and Desmond Tutu have in common?? Find out as TBH, Drakoniques, and Brennan Lee Mulligan go on a wild and hilarious adventure featuring a brand new TTRPG!!!


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing it with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram, and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord, or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
